statements: SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT playlist_name, user_id FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id > 5;
SELECT user_id, playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE user_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY playlist_name DESC;
SELECT playlist_id, user_id, playlist_name FROM playlists ORDER BY user_id ASC, playlist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name, user_id FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id = 3;
SELECT playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY playlist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY playlist_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_playlists FROM playlists;
SELECT * FROM playlist;
SELECT playlist_name, creation_date, user_id FROM playlist;
SELECT user_id, playlist_name, playlist_id FROM playlist;
SELECT playlist_id, creation_date, playlist_name, user_id FROM playlist;
SELECT creation_date, user_id FROM playlist;
SELECT * FROM playlist;
SELECT playlist_name, creation_date FROM playlist;
SELECT playlist.playlist_name, playlist_song.song_name, playlist_song.artist_name FROM playlist JOIN playlist_song ON playlist.playlist_id = playlist_song.playlist_id;
SELECT playlist.playlist_name, playlist_song.artist_name FROM playlist INNER JOIN playlist_song ON playlist.playlist_id = playlist_song.playlist_id WHERE playlist.user_id = 100;
SELECT playlist.playlist_name, COUNT(playlist_song.song_id) AS num_songs FROM playlist LEFT JOIN playlist_song ON playlist.playlist_id = playlist_song.playlist_id GROUP BY playlist.playlist_name;
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT name, created_at FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM playlists GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, playlist_id, song_id FROM playlist_songs ORDER BY playlist_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name FROM playlists WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, name, user_id AS owner_id FROM playlists WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.id, ps.playlist_id, ps.song_id FROM playlist_songs ps JOIN playlists p ON ps.playlist_id = p.id;

SELECT u.username, COUNT(ps.song_id) AS total_songs FROM users u LEFT JOIN playlists p ON u.id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN playlist_songs ps ON p.id = ps.playlist_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_songs DESC;
SELECT * FROM playlists ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT playlist_name, user_id FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, album_name FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';

SELECT playlist_name, song_name FROM playlists INNER JOIN playlist_songs ON playlists.playlist_id = playlist_songs.playlist_id INNER JOIN songs ON playlist_songs.song_id = songs.song_id WHERE playlist_name LIKE '%rock%' AND artist_name = 'Queen';
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name, created_at FROM playlists WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(playlist_id) FROM playlists GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT playlist_name, artist_name FROM playlists JOIN playlist_songs ON playlists.playlist_id = playlist_songs.playlist_id JOIN songs ON playlist_songs.song_id = songs.song_id;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM songs;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM playlists ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT playlist_name, playlist_id FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT song_title, artist, duration FROM songs ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM playlists JOIN users ON playlists.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT playlist_name, COUNT(song_id) AS number_of_songs FROM playlist_songs GROUP BY playlist_name HAVING COUNT(song_id) >= 5;
